thread.section_title: David Sklar & Associates Inc. Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of David Sklar & Associates Inc. | davidsklar.com
thread.title: Kathryn J.
thread.title_full: David Sklar & Associates Inc. reviewed by Kathryn J.

author: Kathryn J.
title: Kathryn J.
text: I wouldn't hesitate to recommend David Sklar if you are considering filing a consumer proposal. I was nervous about doing this but, after taking with Jackie Stanley, the answer was clear. She advised of all options available to me and we choose the best solution to get me out of debt. Jackie was understanding, professional and a pleasure to work with. I couldn't be happier and thank Jackie and the whole team for helping me get out of a bad situation.
